name: Valid bug report with reproduction steps
description: Clear bug report with repro steps should be classified as valid

input.title: Application crashes when processing empty input
input.body:
## Description
The application throws an unhandled exception when given empty input.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Run the application
2. Provide empty input
3. Observe the crash

## Expected Behavior
Should return an error message gracefully.

## Actual Behavior
Unhandled exception thrown.

## Environment
- OS: macOS 14.0
- Version: 1.0.0
